definition: to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost

sentences.english: But there shall not an hair of your head perish.
sentences.chinese: 然而你們連一根頭髮，也必不損壞。

sentences.english: Adamaged or leaking battery should not be transported.
sentences.chinese: 已損壞或泄漏的電池不能予以運輸。

sentences.english: Fixed Lightning Fury to do initial weapon damage.
sentences.chinese: 確實用縮寫名籤武器損壞固定的閃電暴怒。

sentences.english: Fixed Plague Javelin to do initial weapon damage.
sentences.chinese: 確實用縮寫名籤武器損壞固定的災害標槍。

sentences.english: These goods are very expensive, and easily damaged.
sentences.chinese: 這批貨很貴又容易被損壞。

sentences.english: What BrainGate does is bypass the broken connection.
sentences.chinese: 而Braingate做的就是繞過損壞的連接。

sentences.english: Cannot load the style sheet due to a corrupt style sheet file.
sentences.chinese: 因樣式表文件已損壞而無法加載該樣式表。

sentences.english: The body begins to break, you get the loss of P-functioning.
sentences.chinese: 身體開始損壞時，就失去人格功能性。

sentences.english: It also marks bad sectors and recovers readable information.
sentences.chinese: 此命令也標記損壞的扇區和恢復可讀信息。

sentences.english: All of the frieght in the container was damaged.
sentences.chinese: 集裝箱中的貨物都損壞了。

sentences.english: Since the damage was made only to the turning gear , vessel will carry out sea trial tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 由於損壞僅限於盤車機，該船明天將進行海上實驗。

sentences.english: An EMP can seriously damage electronic devices connected to power sources or antennas.
sentences.chinese: EMP會嚴重損壞連接到電源的電子設備或天線。

sentences.english: I overdid it at work and damaged my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我勞累過度，損壞了我的心臟。

sentences.english: The accident didn't do much damage to either of the motorcars.
sentences.chinese: 那兩輛汽車在交通事故中都未受嚴重損壞。

sentences.english: What happens if large numbers of meters go down?
sentences.chinese: 如果大部分電錶損壞，將會發生什麼？

sentences.english: Be careful installing the gold cartridge clips to avoid damage to the clips or wires.
sentences.chinese: 小心安裝鍍金的唱頭線夾避免損壞線夾或唱臂線。

definition: to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
